diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Inherited Interleukin 2â€“Inducible T-Cell Kinase Deficiency with Epidermodysplasia Verruciformis and Hodgkin Lymphoma
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The presence of multiple flat warts, histopathological findings consistent with epidermodysplasia verruciformis, positive HPV typing for types 5 and 8, and high viral load of Epstein-Barr virus in plasma provided a rationale for the diagnosis of ITK deficiency and its association with EBV and HPV.
